'''''Up the Bishui''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to take either [[Bosu]]'s raft ([[Qiaoying Village]]) or [[Sun Rao]]'s raft ([[Yilong Wharf]]).
